message: @all Since everything is complete for this week's Deliverable do you want me to go ahead and merge in Deliverable-1 and turn in the project?
I think so.  did you and @ChandraSapkota  have a successful go at it yet?

I think Chandra was going to take a few days to work on his own version for learning purposes. In my case I'm not seeing a lot of value in going at it on my own since I've already been able to review both yours and Murali's approaches so I'm good for this week
So if you're ok with that I can go ahead and take care of submitting it early (Murali approved yesterday and I'm happy with the code as well, and I believe Chandra was good with it too)
Nice ;-). That way we can have a few clear days of not having to worry about too much until they post the next Deliverable :D
@all Alright we should be all set now (Project 03 - Deliverable 1 should be submitted and the email confirmation has been forwarded to each of you :-))

Sounds good, i was actually pretty close in creating my version of the code, had to see some advanced Java tutorials though, it was great to have a reference when i needed some guidance. Rest of the week i'll be working on it till the point where i would be fully satisfied :D
